value:
$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|I am the blade—the blade my father
wields.$k$pI will do as I am ordered.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If injured, retreat. That is what my
sister said.$k$pI will do as instructed.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Commander Anna! How are the
townspeople?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|It seems everyone is fine—no major
injuries.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Every house, however, has been
burnt to the ground.$k$pThe flames still smolder in the forest...$k$pEveryone is doing their best, but this
town will not recover for some time.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|We should help, too!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Hmm. Our current mission is very
high priority, but...$k$pWe do have a little time. I think.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Then it's settled. Princess Fjorm, I
apologize, but... Do you mind very
much if we delay our departure?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Not at all. I would like to help these
people, too.$k$pPerhaps my lance of ice, Leiptr, could
be used to extinguish some of the
flames.$k$pI'll do what I can to help.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Now, now, your highness. And you,
Princess Veronica. I want to see you
two smiling!$k$pYou've formed a pact to destroy the
Kingdom of Askr, no?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Grrr...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Well aren't you two just peas in a
pod? It makes me so very glad to see
this new friendship. You're so alike.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I have pledged to lend you my Heroes.
I believe that's all you require from
me.$k$pI'll be on my way, then. There's
nothing for me here.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Charming, isn't she? So shy.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Veronica... She is of the ones who
seal the path—the Emblians.$k$pAfter Askr has burned, so will Embla.
So weak...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, my, Your Highness. You'd
slaughter that tiny little girl?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Of course. The world requires only
one ruler.$k$p$EFace_Smile|And as I imagine the look on her
face... Her sobs, her pleas, her
screams as she burns...$k$pWell, you have to laugh! Don't you
agree?$k$p$Sbs150|
